Plot: A musical set in the quaint little town of 'Fudgeville,' The Tale of the Mischievous Fudge Thief is the story of a very special rat and his desperate journey to become accepted as a human by the unwelcoming, fudge-obsessed townspeople.
Title: The Tale of the Mischievous Fudge Thief
Actors: Dale Pengelly, Paul Bryant, Caitlin Browning, Joel Burke
